title: Expected better quality for the price
text: This was a Christmas gift for my two daughters (2 and 4 years old). It was easy to build. However for the price I was expecting the house to be made of a more sturdy material. The hard foam that it's made of is easy to chip. The paper that covers the garage doors are already peeling away from them being opened and shut. The elevator is impossible to move. My girls don't even play with that anymore because it's so hard for them to move up and down. The bar that attaches the elevator to the house is flimsy and doesn't attach well enough to the house for the elevator to glide smoothly. For the price I expected a better quality house. I expected it to be played with and the doors not show peeling paper. I expected the house to be made of a stronger material than foam. If this had not arrived later than expected, we would've found a better house from Santa. Do my girls love it? Yes, but as the person who spent their money on this, I'm disappointed in it.

title: Super Awesome! A huge step up from the all plastic Barbie brand Dreamhouse.
text:
Long story short, my wife first purchased an actual Barbie Dreamhouse from a big box store. The elevator did not work, and the amount of plastic really put me off. Back it went, and I ordered the Majestic off Amazon. Simply picking up the shipping box made me feel better about this purchase over the Barbie brand as the weight of the entire set was significantly more than the Dreamhouse. But, is heavier better? After putting the house together I have to say an unequivocal "Yes!".

There are only a few plastic parts here which are the stairs, the elevator slide mechanism, the chandelier, the clock base, the tub and the toilet. The rest is wood and pressed cardboard similar to what's in the bottom of spec-built home kitchen drawers. Once together this house is very sturdy and a two-person lift to move it any significant distance. Again, I feel so much better about my daughter playing with this wooden house over the all plastic one even if Barbie herself is all plastic!

Putting it together was relatively easy using the included instructions , labeled screws and marked pieces. Assembly was right around 2 1/2 hours going at a meticulous pace. I should add that two pre-drilled screw holes for the roof did not line up with the holes on the structure, and I had to drill new holes. A minor annoyance at best. The most difficult part for me was putting the back walls in place prior to screwing the second side of the house together. Keeping the walls in place and lining up the walls and floors took patience.

The details on the walls, floor and roof are stickers/laminated and I imagine that over time they will show some ware. The furniture is very sturdy and unless abused will not come apart as some have stated. Perhaps mine were simply glued better? The small touches in detail on the included furniture was a nice surprise.

Other reviews stating the floors warped have me thinking that water or some liquid had to be dumped on them for this to occur, or the humidity levels in the actual home are significantly higher than they should be. The floors and walls are as sturdy as one could expect at this price point. I can't imagine them not holding up fine with normal play.

My daughter has not seen it yet as I put it together at night while she was sleeping. I'll update this after she has spent some time playing with it.

All in all I really feel good about this purchase given the look and build-quality of the house.

title: Granddaughter Loves It!!!
text: Christmas present for our granddaughter and she feel in love with it.  It is taller than her and she told us it was the best present she received.

title: Beautiful doll house
text: My granddaughter loves this house, it is very well built and it matches beautifully with all the other furniture from kidkraft.

title: Very disappointed
text: This dollhouse is way to big its taller then an average size girl. If your child likes to sit and play this is not a good dollhouse. In sitting position a child can only reach first floor. The next level is to high and the top level cannot be reached for an average child very disappointed.

title: Outstanding product
text: Way better than any plastic doll house. Sturdy pieces and lots of them. My granddaughters love it. Also it is very large.

title: One happy daughter
text: Well made very durable my daughter loves it price was reasonable

title: It BIG!! :)
text: My husband put this together last night and it's BIG!  We bought it for our daughter for Christmas, so she hasn't seen it yet.  But Oooohhh I can't wait to see her face when she opens this bad boy up!  There are a couple things that bothered us though about it.  The instructions do get a little confusing at times because the images don't have any drawings on them indicating which side of the board needs to be screwed in which direction.  And the pictures on all the boards, came out of the box already coming unglued.  I hope this is normal and it doesn't come off anymore or this was a lot of money for nothing.  But other than those 2 things, this dollhouse is epic!  I wish I had this when I was little. Oh and it stands almost as tall as me! It's really impressive.

title: Great quality. It is very tall though
text:
Great quality. It is very tall though. My daughter cannot reach the top shelf so we moved the baby room to the bottom of the elevator.
The elevator is a little stiff overtime but it has held up great.

title: Terrible instructions but sturdy once put together
text: My in-laws purchased this doll house for my daughter as a Christmas gift. I figured I could get it put together in an hour or 2. I was completely wrong! It took me 4 hours to put together. Just when you think you‚Äôre done, you get to put together the furniture too! The cardboard pieces feel very flimsy, but once put together, the house feels sturdy as a whole. The instruction booklet was all in black and white and many of the pieces were not labeled. Plan to spend a half day putting it together and fill up your entire garbage can with styrofoam pieces.

title: Wonderful sturdy dollhouse
text: Wonderful sturdy dollhouse.  The furniture is nicely made.  My grand daughter loves it and plays with it almost every day.  Other children visiting are drawn to it immediately.

title: Best dollhouse out there!
text: Great dollhouse for the money.  We did a lot of research to find the perfect dollhouse for our 4 year old daughter.  This is it. Perfect size that she can use now with room to grow. Fits her barbies and come with all the accessories she needed.  We call this the babysitter because it entertains for hours. It's big enough to allow us or others to play too. Highly recommended.

title: Best dollhouse ever!!!!
text: Christmas present for our 2 year old! Very well built, every detail is so perfect, the furniture is precious. Easy to assemble with the easy to follow and detailed instructions. Love love love!!

title: AMAZING!!
text:
My daughters got this for Christmas (2012) and they have not stopped planning with it!!! My 5 year old is a pretty tall girl and even she needs a little foot stool to see up to the nursery :-)
The furniture is very cute. Made out of nice quality wood and seems it will hold up for years to come. The furniture is the perfect size for Barbie.
My husband had the house up and ready to go in about 90 minutes (give or take a few minutes). He didn't seem to have any complaints while putting it together.
I give this 5 stars and HIGHLY recommend this dollhouse!

title: Great dollhouse
text: I had this dollhouse now for 3 years. I brought it for my 2 girls who are now 6 and 7. When I first got it, it took awhile to put to together(couple hours) but it was nice and big when I finished. My daughters loved it then and continue to play with it until this day. FYI I bought this product from the Walmart website and payed a little cheaper than this site back then. Also if you checkout the Walmart website now it's like around $116 bucks. Way cheaper than $179!

title: We bought this for our 3 yr old granddaughter and ...
text: We bought this for our 3 yr old granddaughter and she LOVES it!!  It did take my husband and I 2 hours to put it together and it was not hard to do. Very well put together and we know it will last a very long time!  I will say that it is really big!

title: Perfect for little girls!!
text: Built well and so many pieces come with it. I wish they made dolls for it or let you know what size dolls fit best. I would probably suggest Barbie size. And someone had said it only takes an hour to put together...try like 2 hours. But it comes with very good instructions and is made of quality parts.

title: Daughters favorite Christmas present
text: Pain in the back side to assemble but my 3 year old daughter loves this thing

title: cheap do not buy.
text: DO NOT BUY!!!  Screws were of such low quality they fell apart and had to be replaced. The roof came with multiple broken parts, and tiles printed backwards. Fours are sagging. Some walls have cracks down them. Over all the hole thing is cheap and will not last long. If it even comes intact.

title: Doll House
text: My granddaughter loves this doll house. I did not have any trouble putting it together. Only took about an hour and a half. She plays with this daily so it was worth the money.

title: Haileys doll house
text: Absolutely the best doll house out there. We've been looking for about a year now and decided on this one and so glad we did. It is big so make some room. Well worth the price. It took about 2-3hours to put together. It's sturdy and well made. My four year old daughter loves it, she got it from "Santa" this year 2012. And fits the brat dolls, monster high, Barbie, and the princess barbies dolls. The only negative thing I would have to say is the garage doesn't fit even the two Seater Barbie car but hailey doesn't seem to care we turned it into the laundryroom. It comes with plenty of the house hold furniture, but we still added the Barbie laundryroom,refrigerator,and bathtub Barbie sets.

title: This Dollhouse is a big HIT with my granddaughters
text: Well constructed and was easy  to put together.  I bought this for my granddaughters.  My daughter in law put it together and said the instructions were much clearer than they are for most toys.  She had no problems with it and agreed the quality is first class.  6-yr old granddaughter  loves the doll house and will spend many hours playing with it.  Little sister  1 yr old - is chomping at the bits to get to it.  I think it has caused their first "argument" as Lilly wants to eat the furniture and rearrange  Claire's hard work.  I watched Claire put barriers around it and Lilly cried and cried to get at it.  I am so happy I  pruchased this and am sure they will spend many hours playing with it.  Purchased through Amazon seller Babycakes of Scottsdale and their service was first class.

title: Grand kids love this!!!!
text: Took some time and patience to assemble but its great quality and its freakin massive!!!! Comes with an awesome selection of quality furniture. (The plastic items are alright but most items are wood) Pay attention to the screw head colors when assembling, they match the items color that they are putting together.

title: My Daughter Loves It.
text: This thing is truly amazing. First of all, it's massive. It easily will allow for 2-3 kids to play on it at the same time. The assembly instructions were also very easy to follow. The manufacturer even colored each screw to match what it's being attached to. Be aware of that though, as I didn't figure it out until I was almost done. Needless to say, we have some mismatched screws on ours. Also, the assembly time for me was 3.5 hours and I'm a pretty handy guy. The parts all fit perfect though and it's a very sturdy unit. My daughter loves it and I'm very happy with the purchase.

title: Good dollhouse for kids of all ages
text: Good dollhouse, VERY large remember make sure your using the right screw at assembly and you might want to oil the elevator a little but not too much so it moves smoothly but doesn't slide. However after a year some of the furniture that snaps together with little plastic pieces to hold the legs on like the grand piano are falling out but nothing a little glue can't fix. And the house is about the same scale as Barbie dolls.

title: Awesome House
text:
My daughter really like the house, she liked everything from the layout of the rooms to the little details on the background wallpaper. She's able to play with all her Barbie dolls in it.
There is a few things I like to share,
- the house is big, there's a reason all reviews mention the size.
-it's permanent, plastic Barbie houses are easier to move around, take apart and built again.

When building, the instructions are not the best, you will need a couple of hours and a lot of patience. The bolts and screws are packed in order of use and that's awesome!!! DONT TIGHTEN pieces until they're aligned correctly.

Now to say the house is sturdy is an understatement, this thing is solid. And it's HUGE, you can fit a bunch of doll and extra toys. It has all the things my little one wanted, the bed, the elevator, the garage it's just perfect.

title: Five Stars
text: Great quality, and size.

title: Great product for the price!
text: My husband put this doll house together without much difficulty. It is very nice quality for the price and I'm glad we bought it.  There was no damage during shipping and we received it promptly. Thanks, Christmas will now be complete for my 8-year old daughter!

title: Loved it and big house
text: Princess loved her surprise and it is so big, actually taller than me. Very durable and good quality, only thing was instructions where confusing and had to use phone and look up pictures of actual product to assemble.

title: father of the year
text:
they could have had one more screw and bolt attaching the side house to the main but other than that it's pretty sturdy.

the instructions are written like you have a big beautiful, in color, picture of it and you don't. it's confusing to start. I assembled and disassembled to do it correctly more than I'd like.

1 person
main house took 2 hours
side house and unboxing accessories 1 hour

she'll love it

title: HUGE ADORABLE HOUSE!
text: HUGE ADORABLE HOUSE!!! IN LOVED WITH IT SO WORTH WHAT I PAID! REASON WHY I ONLY GAVE 4 STARS BECAUSE WOOD FOR THE MIDDLE LEVELS IS A LITTLE FLIMSY BUT MY DAUGHTER IS OLD ENOUGH TO TAKE CARE OF HER TOYS SO I DON'T SEE A BREAKAGE HAPPENING AT THE FIRST PLAY. ALSO IT TOOK ME 2 1/2 HOURS TO PUT TOGETHER THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE CLEAR IF YOU ARE A VISUAL LEARNER THERE'S NO WORDS TO DESCRIBE WHAT TO DO JUST PICTURES I SUGGEST YOU LOOK OVER INSTRUCTIONS FIRST AND THEN START TO BUILD ALSO PICK A SPACE WHERE IT IS BIG ENOUGH TO MOVE AROUND THE HOUSE IS BIGGER THAT EXPECTED IM 5'5 AND ITS UP TO MY SHOULDER. THE ROOMS ARE BIG YOU CAN ADD ADDITIONAL FURNITURE BESIDE THE ONE PROVIDED. THE FURNITURE IS ALSO GOOD QUALITY. IN MY PICTURE I HAVE ADDED SOME KITCHEN ACCESSORIES SUCH AS PLATES CUPS AND POTS AND PANS, SPOONS THOSE DO NOT COME INCLUDED THAT WAS BOUGHT SEPARATE  OVERALL I AM VERY PLEASED!!!

title: Kidcraft Majestic Dollhouse the best dollhouse!
text:
We bought this dollhouse for our 5 year old daughter for Christmas. She played with a smaller older version last summer at a friend's house and has talked about it ever since. Well she was blown away by this one. It is huge! This house is a great value for the money and free shipping to boot.
We have had no trouble with the elevator, she loves the garage, it fits her barbie convertible too.
We bought a doll family, but barbie fits in this house and even one of the beds it came with. No need for extra furniture to start, it comes with a lot. This has given our daughter many hours of play all ready and I am sure many more to come.

title: But was easy to assemble
text: *Buyer beware* this is not a ready made dollhouse. It should be called a ‚ÄúBuild your own dollhouse kit‚Äù. Requires complete assembly. But was easy to assemble, just very time consuming. I had fun putting it together but many people wouldn‚Äôt. Quality was decent, definitely not the best quality or the most sturdy but I‚Äôm still happy with this purchase.

title: This was a wonderful purchase for my daughters 5 th birthday
text: This was a wonderful purchase for my daughters 5 th birthday. She loves it and it seems to be very durable. Made with great colors and came with a lot of furniture so didn't need to get extra stuff.

title: Would buy again, just keep in mind only about 90% of it looks nice!
text: Overall a great buy! But in saying that, it looks pretty cheap on some pieces. The "wallpaper" is like peeled away from the styrofoam looking walls. So that makes it look cheap. But it is sturdy and the furniture is great! I would buy again for sure, but just expect that some pieces look really cheaply made. Literally like styrofoam.

title: Met all my expectations
text: The dollhouse I purchased was for my two older granddaughters who are 5 and 31/2. I had spent a lot of time researching as I wanted a dollhouse that they can have now and as they get older. The size, the quality of the furniture and the total presentation I thought was perfect. I hired someone to put it together which ironically he had done another exact dollhouse. I would highly recommend to others.

title: Great Barbie house
text: Be warned, this thing took over two hours for two adults to put together. But worth it! Instructions were easy to follow, just alot of steps. Very very sturdy product. Did not realize how massive it was. Daughter is 4 and uses a small stool to reach the top room. But it's so sturdy and well made that I can see her growing into it and using it for years and years.

title: BETTER than Barbie Dreamhouse!
text:
We bought this 2 years ago for my then 4-year old daughter. It took my husband HOURS alone putting it together, so definitely carve out at least 1/2 day to assemble, take a break, etc. And, it is very, very big. Make sure you have measured your space appropriately before you take the time for assembly. The pieces have been mixed up with all my kids other playthings, but it is still used multiple times weekly. At first it was for my daughter and her barbies, but now my 3-year old son uses it for his super-heroes. I've caught both kids, multiple times, trying to scale the front of the house - it has withstood their weight. The garage portion is nice for storing the pieces ... almost fits the barbie VW convertible perfectly too.

GREAT buy, worth the money, very durable and looks very nice in any kids room!

title: Great " Barbie sized" doll house
text: I got this doll house for my to be 5 yr old, I've put it together without any problems , it did take me 3 hrs to complete! I'm just waiting to give it to her, her birthday is in 2 weeks!

title: Five Stars
text: This is a great, relatively easy to assemble dollhouse with ADORABLE accessories. Worth every penny

title: A Mixed Bag, but the Kid Loves It.
text: My kid loves it, but it was a pain in the ass to put together.  The assembly instructions are not as specific as they could be, and it takes a long time to put together. Some holes are not drilled as well as they could be. Further, there was a defective part.

title: Some pieces easy to break, but generally easy to assemble
text: Easy to figure out how the pieces fit. But instructions need to indicate which side of the wall to avoid confusion. Don't tighten the screws until you're sure of the pieces you're putting together. The garage and garden walls did not seem to fit so had to cut a bit to make it fit. Some wooden pieces are easy to crack so had to use wood glue. Finished assembling this in 4 hours!

title: Love it!
text: Great doll house!! A lot to assemble but once's it's together it's great!!

title: missing the stair case from the get go. Took ...
text:
missing the stair case from the get go.
Took too long to assemble. Instruction was not included in the box.

title: Excellent Everybody loves it 5 children
text:
Excellent
Everybody loves it
5 children. It was a present for my 6 years old daughter but her sisters 4 years old and 10 months old loved too.
Also, brothers 7 and 3 years old love. Mom and Dad also enjoyed. We put it all together, it was pretty easy. But missing the stairs!!! And few furniture pieces like the crib and high chair. But still HUGE five stars ...quality is great,colors are wonderful!!! Just more than happy!!!
I will call tomorrow to find out about the missing pieces!!!

title: My nieces are 5 and 6 and they love it!
text: This thing is huge and very well made!!! My nieces are 5 and 6 and they love it!!!

title: Our daughter was very pleased with the final result
text: Boy, Did this take a long time to put together!  Our daughter was very pleased with the final result,  we just weren't initially prepared for the amount of time it took.

title: Best doll house
text: This is a great doll house, it's big and full of great stuff

title: Great buy !! HUGE
text: It‚Äôs huge

title: It's almost taller than I am....
text: WAY bigger than I expected. It was missing a piece when I got it but I got on their website and they sent it to me right away. It does take a long time to put together but as big as it is I wasn't surprised. For the money it is amazing.

title: I loved that it a wooden dollhouse and my daughters live ...
text: I bought this off Wal-Mart.com and paid LESS including tax than what it's selling for on Amazon.  It's huge and took me roughly four to put together with two small children around.  Lol.  I loved that it a wooden dollhouse and my daughters live it!

title: Great quality product. But huge.
text: I read the reviews and I knew it would be huge. I rationalized that both kids could play and it would last a long time. And I'm sure both are true. It is a quality toy for the money with tons of furniture. Fits the barbies. Kids love it. But really it is unnecessarily huge and for that I have a little buyers remorse. If I could do it again would probably do a smaller model from the same company. That said, if you have unlimited space, go for it, it's awesome.

title: Enormous
text: I had not imagined this house would be so large when I bought it for my two year old granddaughter. On Christmas morning, the first thing she did was crawl into it!  You get a lot for the price: lots of rooms, lots of furniture, lots of lousy directions for assembly.  I am an artist and assemble things every day.  I had to take this apart three times before I got it right because the assembly instructions were almost non-existent. All that being said, my granddaughter will play with it for a long time to come.

title: Great purchase!
text:
We absolutely love this dollhouse!! I reviewed several dozen dollhouse options. I wanted something big enough that two or more kids could play at once. The kids love this and play with it daily!! It is very durable and not too difficult to put together. You need to follow the easy to read directions and use some common sense. However, do not think that this could be put together in one night. I worked on it 3 separate evenings, so it takes several hours.

I did have a few pieces that were scratched or damaged. However, I contacted the number in the directions and within days received a replacement at no cost or hassle to me! Customer service for KidKraft is wonderful!! They have one of the best customer service centers I have spoken to in a very long time! I highly recommend this dollhouse, it is worth the cost! If you feel this one is too big, KidKraft makes several other dollhouses. Great company, I would order from them again.

title: Three Stars
text: Prepare to spend about four hours assembling

title: the house was beautiful once it all came together
text: It took us more than 5hrs to assemble. However, the house was beautiful once it all came together. I was surprised by the amount of furniture that was included. Look up YouTube assembly videos before you open the box!!

title: A little girl's dream!
text: We have had this doll house for a few years now, and with the holiday's approaching, I wanted to make sure to get my review up so that parents can make an educated decision when looking for a dollhouse to invest in.  First and foremost, this is a LARGE dollhouse.  It's a piece of furniture in itself.  But every child that has walked into my daughter's room is immediately drawn to it!  My daughter has had hours upon hours of playtime with this dollhouse.  This is the go to entertainment when friends and family are over.  It is seriously fabulous!  Plenty of room for more than one girl to play at a time, perfect size for Barbie, the furniture pieces are so well made and absolutely adorable.  I love every single detail on this house!  I was worried about the elevator, thinking it would cease to work quickly but years later it is still going strong.  We have had no issues whatsoever with this amazing dollhouse.  It is perfect and exactly what we had hoped for.

title: The ultimate dollhouse
text: We purchased this doll house for our grandaughter for her 3rd. birthday.  We keep it at our house, so she has something fun to play with when she comes here to stay which is often.  My husband assembled the product, and he felt the instructions would have been better if it had pictures or diagrams included in the instructions. The number labeling of each piece did help make the job easier.  He was very impressed with quality and precision of each piece as it went together.  As the person assembling the product  he felt it was of very good quality.  The furniture is well made and sturdy. This house would withstand a lot of childplay. It is a tall house and our grandaughter who is now four still has to use a step stool to reach the nursery(top floor).  The elevator needs to move more freely. We would recommend this product for kids and the price was reasonable.

title: So cute and very big!
text: I bought this for my 5 year old twins as their big Santa gift and it was well worth it. It‚Äôs beautiful, not cheap at all very sturdy and would look precious in most little girls rooms. Yes it takes at least 2 hours to put together but it was not difficult, very straight toward instruction. Only advise I would give is this house will go on sale after Black Friday if your buying for Christmas. I didn‚Äôt wait and paid 40 dollars more. If you have your eye on this and want a deal just keep eyeing it, Amazon did sell it cheapest last year but other sites carry it .

title: Beautiful doll house!
text: This doll house is amazing and my two year old daughter absolutely loves it!  It took my husband less than two hours to put together.  He is very skilled and does well with that though so it may take others longer.

title: Ruined Christmas
text: I thought I would be responsible, and buy our daughter's "big gift" early.  We successfully hid it in the garage, and were so excited to put it together on Christmas Eve.  After the kids went bed, we happily opened the box to begin assembly, but quickly realized... there were NO INSTRUCTIONS... NO HARDWARE, and NO STORES WERE OPEN, it being Christmas Eve and all. So, we had nothing to put under the tree.  I can't describe to you how unhappy I am with this product.

title: Best dollhouse available!
text:
After doing tons of research, I encountered this dollhouse and confirmed all the great reviews personally! All of the great things the reviews online are true!
PROS:
The dollhouse is beautiful and huge! Great value!
It comes with tons of furniture- wood material
The dollhouse itself is wood-like material (unlike plastic Barbie dollhouses)
Way bigger and way cheaper than Barbie dollhouses
The design is amazing!
The interior has great designs! The garage works great!
My 3 yr old daughter loves it! It is clear that she will be able to use it for at least 5 yrs!
Just look at how many reviews it has- In my opinion, this is the best buy available!

CONS:
It takes quite some time to build, but it is well worth it!

Believe me, you will not be disappointed. Your kid will love it!

title: Barbie's Dream House
text: We just purchased this dollhouse for our 4 year old for her birthday. She wanted a dollhouse that could fit Barbie. This dollhouse is great, it is big but it seems to be built quite well. The furniture that it comes with is adorable and for the cost it is well worth the money! Great product!

title: Three Stars
text: It has a few bumps and doors dont close well

title: Great dollhouse, arrived with some damage.
text: The dollhouse is great. There was some damage to the dollhouse. Definitely not like new as described by the description.

title: Feels sturdy and well made
text: Husband put this together in a little over 2 hours. Cute furniture pieces came with it. Feels sturdy and well made. I'm very happy with this purchase!

title: You will love it when you are finished putting it together!
text: Perfect! Bigger than I expected so I did have to rearrange the bedroom! But my girls absolutely love it! The only downside is it took me atleast 4 hours to put together! Some pieces were very frustrating. I cussed a lot. Haha.

title: Love it!
text: So this took two grown men a couple of  hours to put together, but the end result was worth it. I researched this extensively before buying and I'm very happy with how it looks. The elevator is very cool, but the Barbie jeep does not fit in the garage. Our daughter loves it and it's a very nice upgrade from the Loving Family set that she had outgrown. As long as you are prepared for the time it takes to put it together and the very large number of pieces, you will be pleased.

title: Super cute!
text: Well aside from having to take it apart twice from mistakenly putting panels backwards it worked out great. It‚Äôs taller than my girls and they love it. Took about 3.5 hours to do by myself.

title: Read the reviews before putting together! Helpful hints everywhere!!
text:
Absolutely amazing doll house! I bought this for my 4 year old for Christmas. Thanks to other reviews I was able to put it together today and be ready 5 days before Christmas! The military mom/ single mom review is by far the most helpful! Def use her Vaseline trick! I didn't get it at first
But once you try the elevator hinge without it you will be so happy you followed her directions!

title: Great doll house for my toddler but has some bowing going on :/
text: I have to start off by saying I do love this doll house! Comes with a lot for the price I paid. It‚Äôs beautiful and my daughter loves it! I bought if a few months in advance for Christmas. I put it on together and it‚Äôs been in a closet in the guest room for two months. I don‚Äôt know what happened or how it happened, but the 3rd floor is bowing. I‚Äôm kind of really upset about it but my husband said we can fix it with a small piece of wood, some wood glue and a small screw on both ends. I mean no one has touched it since it‚Äôs being in the closet. My 2 1/2 year old can open the door to the room nor the closet doors. I just don‚Äôt understand why it started bowing or when. I‚Äôm hoping this hasn‚Äôt happened to anyone else. I‚Äôm trying to think positive thoughts about us fixing it. I just hope it lasts a few years now :( but other than that it‚Äôs a great doll house.

title: My girls love it!
text: This was THE gift this year. My 4 yo and 2.5 yo love it. Barbies fit in the house and on the furniture. Only complaint is it‚Äôs so tall! I wish it was more wide than tall.

title: Buy it!
text: My daughter loves this house! It took me 3+ hours to assemble but most likely because I did it alone but instructions very helpful! Definitely recommend.

title: Simply divine
text:
MUCH better quality that I could've ever hoped for!

Got this for my daughter for Christmas. I was really worried it wouldn't arrive on time and it arrived before the shipping expected date and it worked out perfectly.

It did take me and my husband 2 1/2 hours to build and was bigger than I expected it to be which was a plus for my daughter!

My daughter was amazed that she got such a big "dream house" from Santa. I would defiantly recommend that you get this product, it is of extremely good quality for the price. It's very hard for me to keep my daughter away from it!

title: Excellent
text: My granddaughter was so happy with this.

title: KidKraft Dollhouse
text: I purchased this dollhouse for my 3 year old granddaughters birthday. There was a lot of furniture that goes in to make it look roomy and it took a while to put it together but was worth it. It is very sturdy and very well put together. Someone else had purchased some of the little dolls to go in it and she has been having a blast with it every since.I would highly recommend this to anyone!

title: This dollhouse is great. Huge and good quality for the most part
text: This dollhouse is great. Huge and good quality for the most part. It took my husband and I about 3 hours to put it together. It doesn't come with any dolls but lots of furniture. We got it on sale and I am glad we did cause although the quality was good I would have been upset to spend that much money on this dollhouse.

title: instructions sucks
text: overall this is an amazing barbie house. ITS HUGE! i‚Äôm 5‚Äô1 and it comes up to my chin. it‚Äôs absolutely massive. the worst part about this all was the instruction book. they were TERRIBLE! they were so vague, didn‚Äôt tell you which way the pieces went, etc. it was pretty difficult to assemble and we had 2 people doing it. i‚Äôm also highly disappointed in all these flaws, assuming they were due to shipping. this house took 19 DAYS to be delivered. 19!!! and then it comes like this. a lot of the birds are bowing, like shown in the very first picture of the garage. you can see the wall does not fully meet the floor because it‚Äôs bowing so badly. there are numerous other spots like this too. there are scratches, places where the paper is peeling up, rips in the paper, etc. besides these flaws and the instructions, we absolutely LOVE this barbie house. it is perfect for my 3.5yo AND my almost 11yo! even she can play too because it‚Äôs so big! my inner little girl is so happy for my kiddos!

title: Four Stars
text: Beautiful & huge. Some broken parts but wood glue fixed that.

title: Five Stars
text: Highly recommend

title: Beautiful sturdy doll house
text:
Great doll house with so much attention to detail. I followed the instructions that were provided in box, it took me 2 hours to assemble bit was so worth it!
My 5 year old granddaughter has been playing with it ever since we got it. This product is good quality and fun to assemble.

title: Great Doll house
text: This is a great doll house.  We bought it instead of the Barbie Dream house because we had a Dream house and it broke very easily and very cheaply build.  This doll house is more substantial, stronger built, larger (it is a beast), and easier for the kids to play with.  Barbies are a little over-sized in it but the kids didn't ever notice.  Great buy and great doll house.

title: Obnoxiously big, but oh so fun!
text:
[[VIDEOID:8cac56ff605073aebd6e193dc1ccc4f0]] This thing is obnoxiously big. REALLY look at the dimensions. That being said, look no further to purchase the dollhouse of your child‚Äôs dreams! Probably my five year old, and DEFINITELY my three year old will need a step stool or small step ladder to reach the nursery at the very top.

The furniture is fantastic. All wooden. Very durable.

There were a lot of parts. I started at 6pm, ended at 9:15pm. So 3.25 hours. Not too bad. I messed up a little and had to fix a few mistakes. It was really easy to put together. The instructions were simple and concise. No words. Only pictures. The hardware was clearly labeled and easy to access and distinguish.

NOTE: when assembling take note of the color on top of the screws. I did this but got confused later on down the road and ended up with a few blue screws where a brown one would‚Äôve been better suited.

All in all, my two daughters will not believe their eyes when they wake up Christmas morning and see this monstrosity under..ahem..next to the tree.

If you want a dollhouse that is big, durable, and good quality, purchase this one.

If this review was helpful, please mark below!

title: Kids love it!
text:
I have two girls ages 4 and 2. The doll house is HUGE and they can play with it together easily. The only down side is it takes time and skill to put it together. My husband who is handy yet meticulous, took over 3 hours building it. (Thank goodness I didn't have to do it, it would have taken me a week!) The furniture that comes with it is awesome! Very sturdy and well made. I was pleased with how fast it was shipped too. This doll house will be played with for years to come.

title: Big & good value

title: Know Before You Buy
text: Know this before you make this purchase. This thing is a MANSION. Bought this for my 3 year old and its HUGE. The instructions are terrible and its not easy to put together. The instructions make IKEA assemblies look like a breeze. Besides the terrible instructions and the hours it will take to assemble this is a very nice doll mansion. The quality of the materials seems to be pretty solid. My daughter LOVES this thing and for that reason its worth every hour and swear word that it takes to put it together. I will warn married couples do NOT try to put this together or you will end up divorced for sure. Great value for the money. The company needs to make a Youtube video and step up the assembly instructions to make this a 5 star purchase.

title: Assembly is guesswork at best!
text:
3.5 hours to finish and that is without doing the furniture yet. I could have done it in half of the time if the manufacturer spent $.17 extra on some decent instructions with pictures and words. I put a lot of furniture together and this was by far the most ambiguous directions I have received. There are no words and there are several steps where you could assemble it backwards and just have to guess because the images just don‚Äôt show enough detail. Too much guesswork.

Besides the wasted time due to bad instructions a lot of the pieces just don‚Äôt fit together that well so it is a little rickety. At this price-point I expected better. Halfway through I wanted to return it but it is too much trouble.

Hard pass on this one.

title: they were a bit disappointed that Santa delivered this unassembled
text:
*This review may be edited at a later date by my husband as he is the one who put it together.
This was a gift from Santa for my 2 year old and 5 year old daughters to share. While they were VERY excited to receive a dollhouse from Santa, they were a bit disappointed that Santa delivered this unassembled. Apparently the elves now have something in their unionized contract which gets them out of assemblage on this unit. Santa apparently made an attempt to assemble it in the middle of the night but was unable to complete his project. He left a note by the stockings that there was a dollhouse waiting to be assembled for them in their daddy's workshop. So my husband being of good sport assembled it on December 26th. It was an all day project. And I do mean ALL day. He is handy, builds things and invents things on his own. So he is not an amateur. There were a couple of holes which needed drilling so the screws would insert properly. Also, the directions which came with it were poorly done and there was not a picture of what the finished product was supposed to look like. Thankfully, Amazon carries almost EVERYTHING. So even though this was a gift from Santa, we were able to see what we were assembling. Between figuring out the instructions, drilling some holes, changing out screws so that they were color coordinated and being under the close supervision of a 5 year old who has a tendency to micro-manage, it was an all day project. He did take a couple of breaks (coffee, food, watching Dumbo, etc...). But he started around 11am and was finished at 7:43pm. I suppose if one hadn't stopped to watch Dumbo, eat or drink and if the supervisor wasn't quite as 'present,' it would shave off a few hours. My guess is given the 'right conditions,' if you are a perfectionist, you should allow 5 hours for this.

NOW, that is the negative part. The positive thing is this. IT IS ASSEMBLED!! And the girls LOVE it! Truly. It is a little girl's dream dollhouse. It is HUGE first of all. That in itself is magical. They love the furniture and rearranging it. They can easily play with their play figures and 12-14 inch sized dolls in it. And they love the garage. Their only 'complaint' was that it didn't have a pool. But that is easily solved by getting a barbie type pool and placing it on the side.

All-in-all, I would recommend this. It will provide years of joy!

title: Exceptional Quality!
text:
My husband and I went back and forth between this and the big name brand doll house (think pink) for our 3 yr old daughter for Christmas.
After reading many reviews...we decided on this one. She actually ended up getting both doll houses (long story) so I can definitely compare the two from assembly to quality to which she prefers now.
We put them both together the day after Christmas and the ONLY plus the big name doll house had going for it was that it "snapped" together in less than 20 minutes. We did however take around an hour with this one but the instructions were very clear and the parts were exceptionally labeled. Even had a ton of extras in the event that you lost a couple along the way. 80% of it is solid wood the other is paperboard and plastic...you just don't see that kind of quality nowadays with toys. My kiddos are rough and in the last month or so since we've had it...it's definitely takin' a lickin' to say the least but still looks brand new...the other one...eh, not so much. And might I add that the bigger name costs nearly $50-$60 more than this one and far smaller.
So which do our kids play with...this one of course. The other one, we plan on donating now.

title: Great house, my daughter loves it!
text: First off, my daughter loves it!  She is 2-1/2 and can't quite reach the top floor yet but she has a lot of fun with her dolls and all the furniture.  I can't say that it is the highest quality or easiest to put together (about 3hrs work) but it is pretty good and should last a while.  When you put it together pay attention to the bolt colors.  They all have the same number but some are painted to match the background but nothing in the instructions tells you that and since they're all the same part number you assume they're all the same.  This can cause you some back-tracking if you're not aware of this and you want to make it perfect.  Also have some glue on hand, the bathroom wall on the 3rd floor has a tendency to come out, some of the paper comes loose from the wood so you'll want to glue that back, and one piece of furniture needed to be glued back together.  All very minor things to look out for and easily fixed.

title: Major warping, particularly 4th floor.
text:
I bought this last minute because Costco‚Äôs dollhouse was sold out. I‚Äôve ordered Kidkraft items before and those items were great. This dollhouse isn‚Äôt terrible‚Äîit‚Äôs got a lot of accessories That come with it. It‚Äôs large. Fits barbies. (Not a car though). Fun rooms and areas inside. My daughter loves it.

The assembly took a long time. I don‚Äôt recall how long. None of the pieces were cracked or damaged but there were a few spots where the design was peeling away from the boards. My biggest issue as to why I am between rating this a 2-3 is the warping. I don‚Äôt know how long the house will last and at what point the warping will start effecting playtime. The warping began small and I figured it‚Äôs not too bad‚Äînot enough to go through effort of disassembling and returning. But it got a lot worse very quickly. I looked at other reviews after the fact and saw that others had mentioned this defect. I also noticed it in some review photos that didn‚Äôt mention it. It really seems to be a gamble as to whether it will warp. Construction was not done improperly to merit any sort of warping. Pieces aligned with premade holes and as laid out in instructions. It makes me sad because as I mentioned, my daughter enjoys it for now (the majority of the warping is an area that she doesn‚Äôt play in) and I‚Äôve had good experiences before with kidkraft. Unfortunately, this one was not one of them.

title: This is a great doll house!  Well worth the money we spent on it!
text: We are so very pleased with the purchase of the Kidkraft Majestic Dollhouse!  It is a very sturdy and solid built item.  We had actually purchased another dollhouse for our 4 year old daughter and was very disappointed in the quality of the dollhouse.  The chairs would fall over when she sat her dolls in them and for the money, it didn't seem like it would last very long.  We are so glad we made the decision to return the other one and purchase the kidkraft dollhouse.  When it arrived, we weren't too sure how hard it was going to be to put together, it has so many parts,,, but we were happy to find that the directions were so easy to follow, all the pieces were clearly marked and my husband had it put together in a little under 2 hours.  He would be the first to tell you,,, the time spent putting it together was well worth it to see how well made it is made and how much our daughter is enjoying it.  It will be something that she keeps for a very long time.

title: Color instructions please
text:
The assembling process took me about 3 hours to complete. The slightly annoying part is that the instructions are in black and white. I was several steps into the assembling when I noticed that the screws had different colors too. So I had to take it apart and assemble it again.
Also it was hard to tell which piece should be facing in what direction.. so I had to google different images of the dollhouse to figure it out.
Other than that it is Definitely worth it. My niece spends hours playing with it. I‚Äôll We put our own finishing touch by adding some Christmas lights :)

Well designed doll house.
Highly recommended ~

title: Make time for the building session.
text: My daughter loves it. It's bigger than she is so it should last her for years. The instructions are pretty bad. For the price of this it should have at the very least a link with color instructions. One piece wasn't properly cut which left one of the floors a little off. My biggest issue with it is that the laminated wood isn't glued on well. The corners of almost all the pieces are loose, you could literally peel the decorations off accidently pretty easy. I would give it a higher rating if it wasn't for the price. For a premium price the quality is not there.

title: Poor design / quality
text: As many reviewers state, it takes a long time to put together.  A number of the parts were not cut correctly and also arrived damaged.  Further, the "floors" do not hold up well and started to bend/warp almost immediately.  The third floor by the elevator cannot hold any of the furniture because it bends down due to lack of a support due to the elevator.  KidKraft will send replacement parts but the thing is already put together and will take substantial work to disassemble and reassemble, and even then, I suspect the same problem will arise.  My kid will still play with it but for the poor quality relative to the cost along with the terrible instructions, buyer beware.

title: Huge, sturdy, & great dollhouse
text: My girls love this doll house!  It is a much better quality dollhouse than the plastic ones out there!  The house took me about 5 hours to put together. The picture instructions were pretty straight forward, just make sure to follow which color coded screws to use (& not mix up). I followed the earlier suggestion to payroleum jelly the slider if the elevator before putting it together so that it would move smoothly.  I was able to put the whole thing together myself with the exception if asking my husband to help hold/maneuver the floors at the beginning of the instructions.  The top of the roofline is about the height if my neck--great sized toy that will last for a variety of ages& over the years.  The furniture that cones with it is sturdy and well made. The house fits Barbie's, winx dolls, la dee da dolls, etc...so great size!  No criticism of the house--just plan on the put together time.  By the way--it did come with a latch system if you are afraid it will fall on climbing children.  Great toy!

title: One of the best doll house ever! Worth every penny!
text: my 6- year old loves this doll house! She uses for both her Barbie dolls as well as her Monster High dolls. It is huge and roomy. title: Wow!!!!
text:
I purchased this doll house after reading all the wonderful reviews. Boy, am I happy I did!!!! This was gift from Santa for our 3 year old daughter. It was shipped quick and delivered in a box that has the picture on the outside (FYI). Im pretty strong and it was tricky to move by myself. :-) However, I couldn't wait for my husband to get home for fear our daughter would see it!!
Due to the size, my parents put it together, which took about 6 hours. This is largely due to the fact that they glued each piece with wood glue to make it stronger. The quality is awesome, the colors BEAUTIFUL, and the design magnificent!! The furniture is absolutely adorable and SOOOOOO much cuter and dainty than the Barbie house (doesn't even compare in my opinion).
We will never forget Christmas morning and the expression this brought to our daughter's face....PRICELESS!!! She can't reach the top story on her stool , which means she has many years of play with this house!! The Barbies have plenty of room as do the Disney princesses.
Kid Kraft has awesome products that I would recommend to anyone. We now have their swivel vanity, vanity and table. All have held up perfect and look great!
THANK YOU for another successful year of gift giving :-}

Reccommend getting a friend to help you put this together.

Quite sturdy.
Comes with a wall mount so that it doesn't tip over.

title: You need space for this!
text: [[VIDEOID:d073ac46aef79187330b4b97d8a9204f]] Assembly pretty easy.  Pay attention to the last few steps! House is 53-1/2"High (4' 5.5")x 51"Width (corner of roof to corner of roof) x14"Deep. Four floors with enough wooden furniture to make it feel cozy. Perfect for my 5 year old princess!

title: Best Christmas gift ever!
text: This doll house is everything and more. I had made this order for my 4 year-old grand dauhter's Christmas present. When it hadn't come on the time expected, I contacted Amazon. I was told that the item had been sent back to seller, due to some previous imperfections from other recipients. I was refunded my money, but devastated that I had very little time to find another in it's place. Even Prime was too late for when I needed it. I went to a local toy store and purchased another Kid Kraft dollhouse that was more than double the cost, and much smaller. I had to settle for something much more expensive, and much smaller. We put the new dollhouse together and the next day I had the original one delivered from Amazon. I was so upset, because I couldn't return the one already assembled and without its box. Now, I have the original at my doorstep, and my card was already credited the money. We didn't need 2 dollhouses and I couldn't afford to purchase the original after spending $287.00 on the replacement. I contacted Amazon and explained my situation. Somehow, there was a mix-up and the company sent out my order, even after they told me it was returned. Amazon was so great in handling this matter. I was offered a buy-back of the product I purchased as a replacement, but what I paid was far more than Amazon's price so it wouldn't work. The nice man placed me on hold and returned to say, "Merry Christmas! From Amazon". He said to keep the dollhouse at no cost. That night, we put the dollhouse up and it was as amazing as the picture. It is HUGE! It was easy to assemble, probably because we had some experience from the other. It was perfect in every way. It's very sturdy and heavy. My conscience wouldn't allow me to sell the replacement, being how Amazon was so kind by letting us keep the original for free. We found a little girl that was not going to have Santa Clause and gave it to her. This little girl was so proud, and so were we. Everyone was a winner here, but Amazon, you are truly the best! Thank you!!!!!

text:

One caution is to NEVER lift by the edges of the roof. It is tempting to think the edges make good finger holds but the screws just aren't sturdy enough to hold the weight of the unit (yes, sad experience).

Very nice product!

title: Sturdy wood, 34 pieces of furniture, cool elevator
text: Sent this darling all wood dollhouse to  my 5 year old grand- niece for Christmas.  It took her mom 2 days to put it together, but she didn't have any trouble with the pieces, she thought the directions were a little like working a puzzle but it was totally worth it!  When Olivia saw it she was jumping around saying "Is this for ME..is this for ME!!!  Made me tear up hearing that.  It comes with 34 pieces of solid, cute furniture which makes the price  a good value actually, because buying all of that individually really adds up.  It's tall,  but so Is Livy, and it makes it easy for her mom to play with her. The colorfully decorated  walls give the rooms a lot of depth.  The rooms and elevator are large enough  for her barbies, but they don't fit in the furniture, so I'll probably get some of the 5 inch dolls. She had asked for either a Barbie Dollhouse or a Wooden one,  I am an obsessive researcher and this one had the most pluses overall, and other reviewers said it was better than the Barbie House  Olivia definitely thinks so, and my niece says it's so nice she is going to save it for her grandchildren, lol!

title: Grand daughter loved it! You really have to stay focused putting ...

title: Huge! Awesome! Great instructions! Daughter adores!!!!
text:
This was the best kid gift I have ever had to put together and it took 2 hours (mainly by myself.) Instructions were very easy to follow, parts were clearly labeled and so so so very simple to put together. There are a million parts but the directions make it simple.

My daughter absolutely LOVES this doll house. When she saw it she just stood there mouth opened and stared. It was awesome. My daughter is 6 and this is taller then she is and my 9 year old is just slightly taller than it. It's tall enough that when a toy gets fought over I can put it on the roof in timeout and the younger 2 kiddos can't get it. Make sure you have room for it!!!

The materials seem a little flimsy as the are like a foam board but my terrible two two year old has not been able to break it and trust me when I say that's impressive. He can break any and everything. Not designed for climbing so it you kiddo is short and stool maybe needed to reach the attic.

Only complaint is the stairs. The come out easily but don't put back easily enough for the kiddos to fix so if barbie walks up the stairs with heavy feet I have to put the stairs back on.

Has awesome quality furniture! Cute and durable. Well worth price and time it takes to build!!

title: Great dollhouse!
text: The dollhouse was easy for my husband to put together, but for me, not so much. I'd rather have the instructions in color for me to understand and maybe some working as well. Knobs didn't screw in so well but enough to use doors. Chandelier doesn't hold on so well but my daughter could care less about it. Lol. She loves that's it's big enough for her(8yrs old).

title: Five Stars

title: Wow it's huge!
text:
Hi everyone...Make no mistake, this thing is massive. 5 feet high and 5 feet wide when assembled. This was a Christmas gift for my two daughters, 2 and 4 y/o. The Dollhouse arrived well packed and damage free. If you are an Ikea ninja, and are accustomed to putting furniture together with those little cam-lock bolts and wood screws you'll need a solid 90 minutes to put it together. If you are not, God help you. The instructions have no words...just pictures and numbers...and while the illustrations are clearly drawn, it isn't always clear which side goes where....if that makes any sense...you'll see. My wife and I put it together only having to disassemble one piece that we did backwards.
Beyond the general huge-ness, you'll appreciate the quality of construction. For the money, they did a really nice job. Everything fits, and nothing felt cheap. There is a box of furnishings for the house, including items like a grandfather clock, a piano, chaise lounge, beds, even a plant! I think there are 35 pieces. These pieces are constructed of wood and remind me of Melissa and Doug stuff scaled up to the Barbie range of sizes.
Here is my only known mistake with this thing...DO NOT DUPLICATE MY MISTAKE! I did not buy the doll family pack sold by KidCraft for this house!! So...my girls are playing with furniture and existing off scale dolls while the 'Family' makes its way to our home! So, be sure and order the doll family if you order the house!
I like it, my kids like it, even the cat likes it. (My wife likes it too...though I lost a few points omitting the dolls!)
Enjoy!

title: It is very sturdy. Once it‚Äôs put together it isn‚Äôt going anywhere
text:
Pros:
1. This thing is huge. It towers over my almost 3 year old. I would say that dolls the size of Barbie would work with this.
2. It is very sturdy. Once it‚Äôs put together it isn‚Äôt going anywhere.
3. It comes with anchoring hardware. Anchor this thing to the wall to make sure it doesn‚Äôt tip.
4. It comes with all the accessories, minus the dolls. I am pretty satisfied with the items it comes with.

Cons:
1. The instructions left a lot to be desired. I pulled up a picture of it online as a guide to see how things were supposed to look.
2. Assembly takes a while. Obviously it is to be expected for something this size.
3. Not all of the holes line up perfectly which makes it a little challenging.
4. Some parts of the graphics appear to be peeling at the corners and there is minor warping of one of the floor boards.

Overall I would say this doll house is worth the price. I am hoping it lasts us for years to come.

title: Kid loves it. Mom not happy about buckling floors.
text:
Purchased this dollhouse last December as a Christmas gift for my 8yr old. She initially wanted a Barbie Dreamhouse but I just could not see paying over $180 for plastic or for such a small house. After researching and reading so many positive reviews for this house, I thought it'd be perfect. I like the amount of furniture that comes with it and the overall size. I paid a little more than $125 at the time and felt it was a great value.

The assembly (which I did on 12/27) was not fun, especially since I put it together by myself. Thankfully, no pieces were missing and nothing was broken so I was fortunate not having to deal with that. I would highly recommend having another person to help assemble the house to preserve some of your sanity. I lost track of how long it took to assemble, but it certainly took me more than 3 hours üòµ.

Only one of the legs on the piano is curved, but since that doesn't cause it to lean, my daughter is fine with it. All the other furniture pieces are perfect and holding up well. Though I can't say exactly when it first occurred, what I've noticed and am unhappy about, is that the 1st (dining room & kitchen), 3rd (bedroom & bathroom) and 4th (nursery) floors have begun to buckle/dip in the corners. Any furniture placed near the elevator on the 3rd fl has a noticeable slant. My daughter has 2 flat footed Barbie dolls that can stand up on their own when positioned just right. This can't happen in that area of the house because the dolls will topple over. The furniture isn't heavy, so that's not causing the bending. Nor are the corners areas of the house where my daughter spends most of her time near when playing. I've attached a couple pictures to show what I'm referring to.

Apparently, the material used isn't as sturdy as it seems. What's frustrating is that I can't see a way to place something underneath to help push the floors up without obstructing movement around the house and/or causing the floors to bend further. For the amount of money I paid, and what I see is being charged now for the house, this is disappointing. Giving three stars because my daughter loves the dollhouse and plays with it just about every day, and I've had no other issues (yet) despite these flaws. More time will tell.

title: Beautiful but time consuming to put together!

I believe this kit will be a bit much for some folks. NO NOT think you can begin assembly of this doll house at 10pm Christmas eve. If you do you may still be working on it when the kids get up. text: It‚Äôs HUGE! My daughter loves it and will be able to enjoy it for several years! Did take a bit to put together.

title: It's beautiful!
text:
So I got this, plus anothe (different) one for my daughter's 5th birthday and we love them!

First of all, I love that the box came in just an almost-plain (it had their brand logo ask over it) brown packaging box and it wasn't like the usual brightly colored one with a photo of a child playing with the house on it, I was afraid my girls would see it when it got delivered and the gift/surprise would be ruined. Thankfully that didn't happen!

When I first took the pieces out of the box, it was super overwhelming because there were like a thousand pieces 0_o but after organizing the pieces and laying them out, my panic attack quickly went away.

There were several moments in the assembly process where we weren't sure which way a certain board piece was supposed to face and what not, but I'm not not sure if I can blame the poor instruction guide or if it was just my own "doy" moments. Anyway, after two hours of crawling around on the floor, the house came together and I was stunned at how big it is! I want it for myself now! The product seems sturdy and would be able to handle all my girls playing with it. It's only been a week I feel like this dollhouse completes the look of their playroom.

I most definitely recommend this product to any parent who is looking to spoil their child, and please stay away from those other cheap plastic (I won't say the brand, but it's super popular, starts with a B) "dreamhouse" dollhouses, I bought one before...and I'll tell you that it was so much smaller, for the same price, it was cheap plastic, wobbled all the time, started to come apart that it was tossed after maybe two years. You buy this product, you may never need to look for another dollhouse again!

title: The bad thing is that the boards (cardboard) that act as ...
text: It's a very impressive dollhouse and our daughter loves it. The bad thing is that the boards (cardboard) that act as floors are starting to warp. It isn't from things sitting on top of them, either. They go the opposite direction. I'm hoping it won't get any worse and will last for a couple more years. When you spend this kind of money on a doll house, you expect that it'll last at least 5 years. So far, we've had it six months. Not happy that we're already seeing problems.

For now, it is beautiful and fun with plenty of space for our dollhouse furniture. The stock furniture seems a little big for the house. It took me about 4 hours to build because the instructions are not clear on which direction pieces should be facing so I did have to unscrew 3 or 4 pieces and turn them around. Also some screws are colored on top but the instructions don't say what color you need so you have to match colors up and use your judgement on where you put the silver ones so they don't show.

Besides having to tape a glue a few things together and 2 hours of work I got it put together.  Overall they enjoy it, but it is always disappointing to find something damaged when you put it together and have a deadline of a birthday party that does not allow you to get replacement pieces.

title: Great doll house!
text:
Awesome doll house! Took my husband an hour and a half to build. My 2 yo loves it. It‚Äôs sturdy I don‚Äôt have worries that it will break with her just playing with it. The elevator is hard for her to use so she doesn‚Äôt care for it. Almost all of the accessories were already built for you. The only one needing a tool was the bed.
All we needed was a screwdriver. it came with everything else needed for assembly. Great buy!

title: Quality not as expected
text: We received this as a gift and after a year the floor boards began to bend and bow in the bedroom and bathroom of the house.  Because of this, the wall would not fit in place anymore.  We took it apart and put the floor boards under a bunch of heavy books for a while but eventually they bowed again.  Aside from this happening, the rest of the house and furniture were fine.

title: Full Five GOLD Stars
text: The doll house is truly fabulous. My daughters loved it a lot. It seems sturdy and of good quality that will last my daughters years to come. The instruction manual was straight forward most of the time. The numbering on all parts of the house made building a lot easier. All holes and notches were where they supposed to be. I didn‚Äôt need to drill new holes or force things around. You will know you‚Äôre following the instructions correctly if you don‚Äôt face issues like that. Building the house took aroud 3 hours but that is because I was building it with my kids. I think it will take 2 hours max maybe less If you are an expert at putting things together. You can build the house alone though having some help will make the process easier. The Furnature pieces were smooth and well made. I highly recommend it üëçüèª

title: Awesomely Large Fully Furnished Dollhouse
text:
This dollhouse, at 4¬Ω', is huge and heavy, so you definitely want to assemble it in the space in which it is to remain. I gave it five stars because of its large 9 room size, weight, well-made furniture, and nicely decorated wall surfaces. Parents should take note, however, that its height and weight may pose risk of serious injury to a young child should little hands pull it down, so the most important step upon assembly for me was to secure it to a wall with the two included wall anchors.

Assembly
Two allen hex key wrenches were included, which I supplemented with a medium Phillips head screwdriver and a mini snapoff utility knife.

The first thing I did upon unpacking was to group the parts according to the numbers affixed to each. This proved to be extremely helpful during assembly.

The manufacturer, for some unfathomable reason, chose to forego written instructions for illustrated instructions. Not the easiest to understand, but doable. The parts illustrated, including the hardware, are numbered to correspond with the number affixed to each part. Additionally, some of the hardware is also color coded thereby further easing the assembly somewhat. All in all, it wasn't a terrible experience, just one where I found myself occassionally frustrated by all the flipping of both the illustrations and the actual pieces to ensure the proper alignment prior to screwing pieces together. I also found the pictures of the house posted on Amazon to be extremely helpful during those times I found myself totally stumped. I set aside four afternoons, spending about 7 hours in all on assembly.

I also affixed a strand of battery operated mini led lights to the ceiling of each level to better illuminate the play areas. This proved to be a big hit with the grand who loves flipping on the switch each morning.

Materials
The house is accented with solid wood framing on its front and thin strips of wood trim baseboard running along the rear of the floors. The floors and walls are composed of some type of composite material. The floors are decorated to resemble hardwood flooring; the walls are decorated with appropriately themed furniture and fixtures.
The included furniture sets are a very nice bargain as similar wood sets run upwards of $30. Most of the furniture pieces are made of sturdy wood. The tub, toilet, and refrigerator door are plastic. The only small downside that I can see is that tips of the garage door paper finish lifted in the upper corners a tiny bit during assembly. Not too surprised given that the boards are overlayed with glued decorative sheets of paper. A dot of gorilla glue took care of it.

The house is divided into nine living spaces, including a bathroom, patio, and garage, and has a manually operated elevator. My grandchild absolutely loves this dollhouse and enjoys many hours rearranging the included furniture and moving her doll family throughtout the nine living spaces. It is an awesome dollhouse which will grow with her through the years. One of my best toy purchases ever!

title: Poor instructions make this more of a puzzle than an assembly
text: If you enjoy puzzles, this might be for you. Is this piece # 6 or 9? There's no way to know! Which direction is it meant to face? The directions only show the outlines, so you can't tell. The directions show 2 holes, but the part has 6. Which should I use for this step? Take a guess! Should I use the #1 blue screws, #1 brown screws, #1 gray screws, or #1 silver screws against the green floor? You'll find out when you need the others. If you enjoy looking for clues to solve a puzzle, you might enjoy this. Our construction also required re-drilling two holes that were not completed during fabrication. I've given up on building the garage due to too many misaligned holes. It's a real shame as it'd be a great product but for poor execution and terrible instructions.

title: Excellent dollhouse.
text: This is an excellent dollhouse. It took my husband about 2 hours to assemble. It is very well made an sturdy. My 5 year olds needs a stepstool to comfortably play with the top level. It is HUGE. We had it for about two months now. It has been a real life saver during the pandemic as my daughter spends at least an hour everyday playing with it. My only complaint is the sticky paper around the house is starting to come off around the edges in some areas.

title: Maybe I expect too much since others reviewed it as high quality and easy to put together
text:
My daughter loves it. It's her first doll house and first one I had to put together. Maybe I expect too much since others reviewed it as high quality and easy to put together. I did't find either statement to be true.
The walls are partially delaminated straight out of the box. I can't see it lasting very long before laminate falls off. I will try to glue it in place soon. It tool about 3 hours to put it together in total.
The instructions are not clear and a lot of it is guessing work. There are about 30 steps that have to be followed and probably about 50 pieces that have to come together. I also had to shave off wood on some of the pieces so that they would fit together properly.
Finally one of the floor pieces was mislabeled. The instructions call for it to be labeled #12 but it was labeled #21 instead. I ordered a replacement part before realizing this.

Best way to describe the experience of putting this together is to say it is like a poorly made IKEA item without proper instructions.
I would not buy this again

text:
This house is everything you'd expect by looking at the photo. The furniture is great quality for the price. The big surprise was how poorly the elevator works. My daughter can't use it because it is so hard to move. You have to force it, and forcing it too much will break it. If they couldn't make the elevator right, they should have just left it off. Also, be sure to expect that it will take three hours to put it together. A piece of the steps was broken off then we got it that is used to connect it to the house. I will contact the manufacturer and try to get a new one. The steps do work, but if they are played with too much they will break off.

Besides that, it's a pretty cool house. My daughter enjoys playing with it. She is too short to play with the top floor, but again, she really enjoys playing with it. If I could go back in time and do it again, I would still buy it.

I spend a lot of time trying to stop my 5 year old son from destroying my daughter's doll furniture. Barbie sized dolls are recommended for the size of everything.

title: great dollhouse, few minor complaints
text:
Our four year old loves this dollhouse and plays with it daily. I'm sure it will get many years of use. However, there are a few things that bother me, but would not have prevented this purchase.

My minor complaints are:

-while each piece is numbered for less confusing assembly, the stickers are on the face of the larger pieces making it almost impossible to remove them without stripping off the designs. Please use caution removing all stickers
-Our bed did not come with screws so we had to supply those ourselves
-the elevator is extremely difficult to move up and down. I can hardly move it so there is no way my child could do it on her own
-the house is not very deep and while i like the garage feature, no doll car fits inside

That's it. Other than these minor complaints,i really like this dollhouse.

We have a lot of kidcraft products and all have withstood regular use for many years, but after only a few months this dollhouse is sagging and breaking. The width of each floor is not properly supported and can barely hold the weight of the dollhouse furniture, much less stand being played with. I‚Äôm so upset, since it looks like this one isn‚Äôt going to survive for much longer. I think it‚Äôs a poor design, especially for kidcraft who usually do such a great job with their other products.

This went beyond my expectations and I've had the house in storage for 2 months waiting for Christmas and it was more than expected. I love KidKraft items and I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a big and sturdy dollhouse with a budget.

title: Made my daughter's Christmas!
text: I can't say how amazing this dollhouse is. The positive reviews before mine say it all very accurately. This is well made. My husband kept saying "wow" as he was putting it together.  The instructions were very detailed, the parts were all included, the holes lined up properly and the end result was great. It did take my husband about 2 1/2 hours to put together with his drill, and he is very handy. It wasn't difficult at all, just detailed, which is not a bad thing. This is a very large dollhouse and will last my daughter for years. She plays with barbies as well as the smaller kidkraft family dolls. Either will work great with this dollhouse. The furniture is just adorable. You will not have to purchase anything to go with it (other than dolls, if you don't have them).  Be aware, however, that the top floor is too high for my 4 year old to reach without her stool (but she doesn't seem to mind).  Also included are safety mounts to secure it to the wall in case you have a climber :) Overall, we are so very happy with this product and the priceless reaction it got from our daughter on Christmas morning. Thank you, Kidkraft!!

title: All together, I am happy with the product
text: It‚Äôs a bit overwhelming when you first open the box. However, everything is labeled properly and fits together nicely.  I would definitely recommend looking at the photos taken for the product on Amazon while you are putting it together. The instructions are black and white and if you‚Äôre not paying attention, the garage area can be a bit confusing. The area behind the elevator on the third floor Is a bit flimsy. You could remedy this by bracing it from below and adding a few drops from a glue gun. My daughter is also a little bit harder on things and maybe she put our cat in the dollhouse bedroom... All together, I am happy with the product.

title: 5 stars, but DO NOT ATTEMPT PUTTING TOGETHER ON CHRISTMAS EVE.  YOU WILL FAIL!!

The top of her head comes just to the bottom of the top floor. The garage on the bottom left is her "Stable" for her horses. the furniture that comes with it; im highly impressed with- its solid wood and very durable/well painted/  She received it last week and has played with it nonstop. If she never uses it again  I feel I got my money out of it. its made of wood support and the walls are a thick foam board (but not like a typical foam board, kind of like a concrete foam board if that makes sense) very sturdy. I still give 5 stars but heed from my experiences. DO NOT ATTEMPT PUTTING TOGETHER ON CHRISTMAS EVE/ NIGHT BEFORE BIRTHDAY ETC!!!. YOU WILL FAIL!!! DO expect to break down and question your decision to buy, Do expect feeling inadequate, But DO NOT give up. Other parents have succeeded and so will you!  Its like IKEA furniture- there are only pictures, 1000 little screws/clips, and special little tools that were made for little elf hands. I like the kidcraft products, they seem to hold up over time. title: Three Very Satisfied Customers

It was a little taller than my 7 year old and big enough for all of them to play with together without fighting over space.  They play with it daily, sometimes together, and sometimes alone.  It is wood and very durable.  The rooms are all really nice looking and the furniture is wood.  We got it on sale so for the price, it was a steal but even at the original price it's a good deal because all of the furniture comes with it, it's solid, and it's huge.  My husband put it together in about 2 hours (maybe less) and was impressed at how easily he got it together (usually, he spends hours swearing at the directions - not this time).  I love this dollhouse and so does everyone who sees it.  Definately more sturdy than the plastic houses and gorgeous.

The dollhouse is made out of good material (sturdy) and I was very impressed at the quality of the furniture. Should be a toy my children can enjoy for years to come. My daughter can't reach the nursery (she's 4) but it doesn't seem to bother her. She gets a kick out of the garage and loves to rearrange all the furniture. She hasn't stopped playing with it since she got it. I bought it a few weeks ago on Amazon for 130.00 and am shocked to see the price at almost 300 now. Walmart also sells it online for 150 and has a video to watch if your still on the fence about purchasing. Best present we've ever bought! No regrets.

text: We'll let's start with how the instructions for this really SUCK Luckily my husban is a handy mand and figured it out and  it only took him 1.3 hours to assemble using a power tool. Other then that my daught loves it!!! It pretty big and I'm glad when we received the package nothing was damaged.  The quality is actually pretty amazing too!
