title: BEWARE, the floors bow badly...a little finger trap!
text: the instructions are horrendous.  But I worked them.  After hours of careful construction my kiddo had the dollhouse in our living room for only days when the floors bowed so badly it was dangerous for little fingers. It's not uncommon either!  Amazon reviews are filled with " badly bowed floors" being an issue.  And kidkraft know about it!  Claims new floors will fix the issue.  how has this not been addressed or corrected beyond the parents needing to call, get new floors, and dissemble the entire house to try out new floors?!?  Forget that!  This was returned, at amazon's cost.

It is all wood and it even came with plenty pieces of wood furniture. It came with detailed instructions so it was very easy to put together. It is also bigger then I thought so I was very impressed. The price here beats any price at any local store. She plays with it everyday and she will enjoy playing with it for many more years. I definitely recommend this dollhouse for any little girl.

title: My 4yr old daughter received this doll house as a ...

title: Super Impressed!
text: [[VIDEOID:3a44f4e5de9003d3b37b977b59aad1d4]] This doll house does not disappoint. Do not try to assemble this alone, it is definitely a two person job. It is sturdy on its own but rather large and slightly too heavy, so attach it to the wall if you can. It is so similar to the one I had as a kid, my girl is going to LOVE it!

title: HUGE!
text:
This dollhouse is pretty awesome. It took about 2.5 hours to put together. They even match the screw heads to the color of the area in which it's being screwed on. I bought this instead of a cheap plastic dollhouse that my daughter will tear up or outgrow in a year.

The ONLY things I really was concerned with, part of the house cracked when tightening a screw. And some of the pictures (floor/wall) came off when removing the stickered numbers they have to guide you through putting it together. Which I‚Äôm sure could have been avoided if I used GOO GONE or something. I probably over tightened the screw as well. Not really a big deal. You can hardly tell.
The box it comes in is pretty heavy and TALL. (Obviously!) This dollhouse is amazing.

I would recommend this to friends/family AND TO YOU!

title: Fantastic dollhouse!
text: I did a lot of research on which dollhouse to purchase. My 5-year old wanted a Barbie House that she saw in the stores.  I watched the price fluctuate throughout November and December ($100-175).  I couldn't get myself to buy it though (the plastic construction, lack of furniture, some less than stellar reviews).  So, I researched more on Amazon and found KidKraft.  The reviews for this dollhouse were off-the-charts outstanding. The only real downside that I saw was the assembly time of 4-5 hours. The product arrived on time and all of the pieces were there.  Yes, it did take about 4 hours to assemble.  This dollhouse has been an absolute stunning and attention keeping activity for both my 3 and 5 years old (and their friends!)  The furniture is also wonderfully crafted and fits Barbie and princess dolls.

title: My 4 year old loves it!  Little hard to assemble...
text:
My 4 year old loves it and plays with it for hours even by herself.
She plays with it with her littlest petshop dolls.

It took good couple of hours for my husband and I to assemble.
Some parts were so hard to line up.

Be careful to peel off the stickers (numbers) it might peel off the surface.

We had two number 39s. One of them were suppose to 36. It took us forever to figure this out.

Also be careful when you tighten the screws. The wood got split in a couple of place.

My husband and I feel like it's all worth it. My daughter loves it!

title: Highly recommended - plan for extra assembly time
text: Purchased this as gift for my 6 year old daughter, who loves it. Key features: big enough for Barbie dolls, comes with furniture to fill the house (though some of it is a little undersized for Barbies), lots of details throughout to make it appealing. Two drawbacks: plan on about half a day in assembly time and have two people - makes it a lot easier to handle. Second, look at all the pieces before you begin putting it together. We had one piece of furniture break during shipping (the fridge, which was easily fixed with a little tape). I had read in prior reviews that this was a problem, though our damage was not to a crucial component.

Should be your first pick of you want to be satisfied with what your getting for time and money.

title: Christmas Dollhouse
text: I don't usually write reviews either, but when I purchased this dollhouse I had no reviews to go by, so I wanted to be sure to write one. We got ours delivered pretty quickly, it's a big box, and has a colored picture on the front.  My husband assembled it in 1 1/2 hours, but he is a handy guy.  I didn't think it would be as big as it really is!  Our daughter is tall for her age and she won't be playing in the attic area just yet. (I posted a picture for size reference)  Definitely big enough for multiple kids.  The walls are sturdy, not solid wood, but composite.  I have no complaints, furniture is nice, for the price I think you get more for your money than others and my girls can play with this for a long time.

title: Worst instructions in the history of instructions.
text: The doll house looks great but assembling it was a nightmare. The pieces come decorated front and back but when you‚Äôre assembling it the instructions show blank pieces so you have no idea which way the piece should go. The instructions also do not label a single thing as inside/outside/front/back so you don‚Äôt know until you‚Äôve already assembled sections if something is backwards or upside down. I ended up chucking the instructions and assembling the house from pictures of the finished house online. Save yourself the frustration and just burn the instructions if you buy this house.

title: Amazon Warehouse deal...
text: I for starters read all the reviews for allot of dollhouses before I decided to buy this one. I purchased this from Amazon warehouse deals for I think 50.00 off. So I  got a great deal.  It was discounted because the description said used very good condition.  I could have bought one for fifteen dollars more for a used like new. Let me start by saying the box was intimidating on arrival because it was pretty beat up. As my husband and I started to unwrap the pieces we realized everything was sealed. It had never been put together before.  Just the box was damaged.  It was brand new! The directions were easy to follow,  the pieces are numbered, and the screws are color coded. The first thing we put together was the elevator.  Previous reviews had sad it sticks so we sprayed a little silicone on it. Big mistake. Now it just hangs out on the second floor. So test the track first! All in all it took a couple hours . We are extremely happy with the results and our 2 and a half year old loves it.

Thank you Amazon Prime for helping Santa get lots of hugs and cookies this year.

title: Assembly issues, but little girl loves it
text: This is a giant house of every little girls dreams. For parents, not so much. The directions are in black and white, no verbiage clarifying each step. It was difficult to get the correct pieces together. There was minor areas where the decorative paper was torn. After making it through the assembly, it is magnificent. However, I nearly put the thing back in the box and sent it back. Persevere and you will be happy. Perhaps have a glass of wine before you begin assembly.

title: Wonderful once put together.
text:
Pros
This doll house is absolutely beautiful! I‚Äôm 5‚Äô1 and the top of it comes up to my nose ! The pieces are beautifully crafted and are made of sturdy wood. The house and furniture fit 12‚Äù dolls and even my older sons action figures. The elevator is easily moved to the different floor levels. It took us about 3 hours to put together. My girls absolutely love it !!

Cons
There are NO pictures on the instructions. Which would be helpful in some parts. But we looked up a video on YouTube to reference . And that made things much easier. On the directions alone it would have took much longer.

The floor boards are quite thin and could possibly break in half if not handled gently while installing .
Just handle all pieces carefully.
Sturdy when installed but until then we handled with care.

All and all the doll house exceeds our expectations and will give our girls lots of memories for the years to come !! We love it and it is worth the buy !!

title: I so love this dollhouse!!
text: Great dollhouse. I purchased this directly from amazon the first weekend of december for $130.00. Such a great deal!! This is the cheapest I have seen it anywhere! After reading some of the other reviews, I was careful not to tighten the screws on the elevator very tight. The elevator is still put together in a sturdy fashion and moves with ease. I had to be careful about putting the pieces together the right way. The picture instructions are not real detailed. It helps to print off an internet picture, no colored picture on the box. It took 2 hours to put it together but the dollhouse comes to my shoulder and I'm 5'5". That's about how long it would take to put together funiture of that size. All the doll furniture comes with it. It has a lot of detail. The harware is color coded to match the background. Beautiful and sturdy dollhouse.

title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT! STAY AWAY!
text: Assembling this product proved to be an absolute nightmare.  Directions are vague at best.  The illustrations to do not show what side should be facing which way (pieces are double sided), causing a guessing game for the assembler.  After a few hours, I was at a step that had the 'floors' being attached to the side of the house. The holes for the screw and receiver did not line up.  Once I confirmed I did not make a mistake along the way, I realized the only fix was to clear out some of the manufactured piece.....which meant a trip to the hardware store to purchase a Dremel.  Once I cleared out the piece, the holes finally lined up.  Excellent craftsmanship KidKraft (that's sarcasm).  Then as the instructions state, I stood the constructed pieces up to insert the scenery background only for an integral piece to completely split from the main assembly.  Game Over.  Looking at the piece that broke, I noticed that the material used for the main floors/walls are basically cardboard.  Very poor materials, terrible directions, inadequate hardware, etc. add up to a very poor product.  LOOK ELSEWHERE!

My grand dtr is almost 9, & she absolutely loves the dollhouse. She was so shocked when she saw it! It keeps her busy with creative play, & distracted from tv & video games, habits we r trying to break. It does take hrs. To assemble!
It is wide & tall, so you need a place for it! Otherwise, we r quite pleased.

title: QUALITY CONTROL MISSED THIS !!
text:
PLEASE OPEN AND CHECK ALL YOUR PIECES BEFORE CHRISTMAS EVE!!!
They put a piece together wrong on one of the floors and it turned a great gift into a jimmy rigged gift.
We have made it work but for the money I paid I deserve better quality than this.

title: My daughter has LOVED playing with this
text: Husband spent about 3 hours putting this together but it was simple, just time consuming.  My daughter has LOVED playing with this.  It was the perfect addition to our play room.  Perfect size for my 5 year old.  Her barbies fit comfortably inside the house.  Great buy for the price, very worth the money! Would buy again!

title: We love kidkraft products for our daughter
text: We love kidkraft products for our daughter. Sturdy and pretty easy to put together. I feel like this would definitely last longer than a plastic Barbie house.

title: Wonderful
text: My 6-year old is going to be blown away by this dollhouse on Christmas morning.  It is very well made, sturdy, and beautiful.  It took me about 2 1/2 hours to assemble but was well worth the effort.  The assembly instructions were well done, items clearly marked, I had absolutely no problems with assembling it and I had never done anything like it before.

title: Easy to put it together!
text: Daughter love it!

title: Great product, instructions need to be better
text:
Great product.
Intricate thoughtful design.
Not very difficult to put together but the instructions could be better. They were bare minimal. This led to several small Errors which could easily be avoided with a little more detail or with better illustrations.

title: My daughters love it!
text: Good quality for the money.  So many chinsy little things cost $20-$30 and there's nothing there!  I have three girls and they all can play with this and have fun.  It was larger than I expected but we made the room! The only thing I noticed is that the elevator is a little hard to move up and down.  I am so happy I purchased this product.  I know my girls will have many years of fun!

title: Awesome! Must buy!
text: We purchased this dollhouse for my 3yr old for Christmas. I read all the review before purchasing and they were accurate! Give yourself time to assemble, (Christmas eve was cutting it a little close) but so worth it. My daughter's face lit up, it was priceless. She plays with it everyday. So sturdy, the furniture included is awesome. Holds lots of dolls of all sizes. Would highly recommend!!!!!

title: GREAT buy but definitely some minor faults and quality issues!
text:
[[VIDEOID:289a345f2f7740bdb5689a2bd732b763]] Okay for starters, THIS IS A MUST HAVE! Four stars only for a manufacturer‚Äôs mistake but still great despite that.
I got this gift for my four year old daughter as a Christmas gift. I‚Äôll list pros and cons so this will be quick:
Pro:
1. Comes with all furniture and everything you can imagine to put in a dollhouse
2. Fits Barbie dolls
3. Your child will be OBSESSED FOR HOURS
4. It‚Äôs sturdy so I imagine it‚Äôll last long
5. SUPER tall, I have a pretty tall four year old and she‚Äôs just past the third floor. So she‚Äôll definitely grow into it.

Cons:
1. Terrible instructions! I had to look up a YouTube assembly video just to get through most of the steps!
2. One of the floor pieces was installed wrong by the manufacturer. (See picture/video for reference). They drilled the holes for the stairs on the wrong side and I know it wasn‚Äôt my mistake because the stair railings fit perfectly in their holes. So it‚Äôs pretty annoying how the stairs are wobbly and can easily be moved!
3. Some of the wallpaper was already peeling but not too noticeably. Some edges seems a bit worn as well. Definitely a quality issue there.
4. If your kid isn‚Äôt too strong, the elevator may be a little difficult for them to push up and down alone.

All in all: If you‚Äôre a military mom, or single mother, or just a mom in general you‚Äôre probably used to putting things together alone. A one person job took almost 4 1/2 hours with breaks in between so doing this on Christmas Eve felt like a nightmare.

Great gift choice and I DEFINITELY do not regret it one bit!!!

title: BUY THIS ONE
text: Amazing - worth double what we paid! Incredible quality! Really, really happy. Buy this one.

title: Didn‚Äôt hold up well
text: This product was beautiful and perfect when I got it, easy to assemble, the furniture is perfect. However, over time it did not hold up so well. I‚Äôve only had this product for almost 4 months and the floors are bowed on 2 different levels. We have never had anything but the furniture provided and barbies in this doll house and have never sat anything on top of it so there has never been excessive weight on it. Now with the floors bowing it is hard to get furniture to stand correctly. I‚Äôm super disappointed because I thought we would have this house for the long haul!

title: Horrible directions
text: This doll house took over 4 hours and the directions suck there are no pictures showing which board goes next.

title: Huge,  time consuming, worth it.
text: Don't try to put it together the night before. It takes time and is kinda frustrating. But over all not as terrible as other toys I have put together. It is tall (very tall). Definitely worth the money.

title: Really well built.  I know because I built it ;)
text:
So....... I actually had a great time putting it together. It is pretty simple if you just take your time and make sure you follow the directions. It took me about 2-1/2 hours by myself. I do recommend having a second person though. Also make sure you don‚Äôt over tighten the screws. The wood is soft and will break if your not careful. I also recommend putting it together close to where you are going to keep it. It‚Äôs really big and would be awkward to carry.

I absolutely recommend this product. My girls are going to have years of fun playing with it.

title: Wow I'm impressed!!
text: I purchased this for my 2 year old daughter after a lot of comparison to other dollhouses. It's amazing and she loves it!  It's so big she can't reach the top room, and the materials it's made out of are so sturdy so this should last until she outgrows it after many years. Not difficult at all to put together. It's beautiful and would work for much older girls as well. Plus all her little friends love it when they come to visit. Great purchase!  All the Kidkraft dollhouses are well made, we just wanted the biggest one. You can't go wrong with this if you have the space. No cons so far, except I haven't found a doll car that fits on the garage. A small inconvenience for such a great product.

title: Love!
text: My 3-year old LOVES this dollhouse! It is huge. Time consuming to put together but so worth it.

text: It took my husband and I an afternoon to build, but the instructions were easy to follow, everything was included as listed, and everything was in good condition. Two floorboards (top & ground floor) were a little warped, but we had left it sitting in the box unopened for nearly 2 months (got it while it was on sale for our daughters birthday). My daughter is ecstatic to have this beautiful dollhouse!

title: great dollhouse for the money
text: I got this for my daughter for her 5th birthday. She was unbelievably excited when she seen it. It is HUGE! She is almost 4 feet tall and this is still taller than her. The garage has turned into her animal barn which she absolutely loves. She plays with it every day. I bought it right before christmas for 97 bucks which was an amazing deal. My fiance was able to put it together in about an hour with a power screwdriver. This is a great dollhouse.

title: Fantastic toy
text: It's not that difficult to assemble. My daughter loves it because its really a complete house with furniture. It has given both my daughter and I great happiness!!!

title: Five Stars
text: My daughter loves it!!

title: Perfect for Barbie!
text: Perfect size for barbie products! It is very big and spacious. Barbie car fits in the garage but you can't close the doors all the way. The house is a sturdy build and good quality. The wood accessories are beautifully made! I'm 5'8 and it's almost to my shoulders. It's taller than my 9 year old and she loves it!

title: Great buy!
text:
I have had my eye on this dollhouse for months and finally purchased last week when the price dropped to $152. I was a bit nervous as the outside box was pretty beat up and I could hear things rattling as the UPS man carried it up the stairs. I was pleased to find the actual product box damage free and all the pieces inside looked great despite being loose in the box. I used my vacuum to go over each piece as there were tiny styrofoam pieces all over.

It took a couple of hours to assemble but I was able to do it on my own. I'm barely 5 ft tall and this dollhouse is almost as tall as me. The directions included pictures although you had to make sure you oriented the pieces as shown. All you need is a phillips head screwdriver and the included allen wrenches. The screws are color coded and labeled, although there are no extra screws.

As soon as I had the house together, my girls put the included furnitue in the rooms and their barbie dolls started moving in. The Majestic Mansion Dollhouse comes with 35 pieces of furniture. The dolls fit great on the bed and at the piano but they are a little big for the bathtub. The babrie car and jeep that we have can go inside the garage but you can't close the doors. My girls are 7 1/2 and 4 years old and there is plenty of room for them to play side by side. Overall we are very pleased and hope this dollhouse will entertain our family for years to come.

title: Fantastic!!!
text: Could not be more satisfied! It‚Äôs huge! Granddaughters love it. Perfect for barbie dolls. Easy to assemble. Very well made. Worth every penny!

title: Very good buy :)
text: I bought this doll house for my little girl who will be turning four in a few weeks.. we got it for her for Christmas and when she saw it she loved it she went right to playing with it! I will say I did not buy the small dolls that they want you to buy with this instead I bought barbies and they fit just right. I love the doll house its very large and just perfect for a little girl its a great buy. It'll take at least three hours to put together and you should ateast have someone to help you in the first few steps to make it easier the house comes with little hooks that you can attach to the wall so it won't tip over, I didn't have this problem its a little top heavy but it shouldn't be a problem in less your child likes to climb onto things  I hope this is helpful :)

title: Time consuming but strudy and cute
text: Very cute and very big doll house. Like all the other reviews it did take 4 hours to do. And sadly I could only do it last night but it got done. My girl loves it. Tools were all lettered instructions not the most clear. I referred to the pictures on here and that helped a lot. Defiently worth the money for such a cute and large doll house!

title: Incredible Product
text: Couple of tweaks to the directions would help but overall a very good product once finished.  I would also recommend using a power drill for screws to save time.  Be careful screwing things in as some of the cardboard pieces easily be damaged.

title: Lovely Doll House
text: This is beautiful.  It is tall and my 3 year-old granddaughter will grow with it.  She loves it and really using her imagination.

title: great product for the money. kids love it.
text: The size and construction of the dollhouse is great. Our daughters were so happy to see how big it was on Christmas day.  They said they didn't know they had ones these big. The thing they don't like is how the steps or elevator do not go up to the top floor so there is no way of getting the dolls up there the right way. It looks weird they said. I agree with them out should have been made a little better as far as that goes. They like all of the furniture that came with it except the wooden flat animal. It doesn't look real at all. It could have had more thought into that.

title: Damaged returned product arrived
text: This product arrived with multiple missing parts, broken sides, half the screws missing and the other half in a ziplock baggie. This was clearly a return and a very damaged return at that. I‚Äôm disappointed to receive this before Christmas.

title: a great dollhouse
text: This dollhouse has plenty of room for my 4 year old and the elevator is easy for her to use once we waxed the tracking for it. The only recommendation I have is for the instructions to be in color because at times it was challenging to know which way to face some of the panels since they have print on both sides.

title: Beautiful doll house, my daughter loves it!
text: I decided to buy this for my daughter's 4th birthday present. I order the item 2 days before my daughter's birthday, I didn't think that it would come exactly on her birthday! That was a great surprise for me! My daughter loves it so much, she has been playing with the doll house everyday. I appreciate the seller shipping it and getting here on time. My daughter tells everyone about her new dollhouse, I'm glad she likes it.

title: High quality, Sturdy and Huge
text: Have to say that I'm very pleased with this dollhouse.  It is pretty labor intensive, but worth it for how sturdy it is.  As far as kid's playhouses go, this thing is rock solid.  It also comes with wall tethers, so no risk of it toppling over.  I was surprised by how big it is.  It is huge!  It was purchased for my 7 year old, and it is taller than she is.  Also, my daughter was thrilled by all of the furniture and accessories.  Top notch quality playhouse.  I would recommend it to anybody.

text: My niece loves this house! It's the biggest one that I had come across; and for a reasonable price. It took some time to put together so be ready for a million pieces and vague instructions.... But all in all well worth it.

title: Great product, great value.  Long assembly time.
text:
Great product. Very sturdy and quality craftsmanship. My 3 year old loves this dollhouse. My wife and I debated this product or the plastic Disney princess castle...I am happy with this decision. It will last much longer.

The one negative comment is that the assembly instructions lack detail. Many walls and floors have decals...the instructions show none of these wallpapers...so extra time is spent figuring out which piece is which. Assembly takes 2-3 hours.

title: My daughter loves it.
text: Came very nicely packaged inside a plain brown box.  Perfect for a surprise gift.  Took me about 2 hours to build it alone and taking my time.  The directions are good.  Ideally, you want to build this where its going to stay, or at least within a draggable distance.  Its heavy and big and hard to move once built.

title: The dollhouse of my dreams
text: My 6-year old self is sooooo jealous of this doll house. It is so tall, my daughter needs a small step stool to reach the top floor. She loves all the furniture. It is very sturdy and I hope it will last for many years. The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because the instructions are not helpful and it takes a long time to put together. It took 2 adults over 3 hours to assemble, and we had to google some instruction videos. I'm so glad we didn't wait until Christmas Eve to set it up. That would have been a very long night. But overall, we are very happy with this purchase!
